html: 3.3.17  7:30 pm   Please help me

3.3.17  10:55 am   hey bill, i am a musician and, like yourself, i am in favour of originality and weird shit, but having jumped into the musician industry i have realised that it primarily consists of sycophants and shallowness which makes me very sad. how do i become successful at music while still being different and happy?
3.3.17  9:16 am   Is it fair to say that this website is the biggest thing to happen to you in the last 5 or so years, and if not what is?

3.3.17  9:10 am   You're incredibly self-motivated in your personal projects. Were you reliant on other people for motivation throughout your life, and if you were how did you change that? For someone like me, whose motivation comes 99% from other people telling me to work on my projects, do you have any tips? How do I become as motivated as you are to work on things?

3.3.17  6:25 am   Is there any process that you use for tagging the videos you use for reality and improv? e.g. "oh, i talk about the video schedule in this one so i should tag it with that".

Also, I know that music is your highest priority, but when it comes to reality, do you know which videos you'll tackle first? (e.g. editing the videos between now and HoJ before going back to what you skipped)
